parameters.ApprovalCreationInput/details: @{triggerBody()['text_2']} in the amount of @{formatNumber(triggerBody()['number'], 'C')} is awaiting your review. Please click the link below to open this request directly. When ready, use the Approve or Reject buttons to indicate a decision.
